sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./terms.css"; import { Button, Typography, Avatar } from "@material-ui/core"; const Return = () => { return (

SHIPPING & RETURN

{/*
*/}

SHIPPING POLICY

We are committed to delivering your order with good-quality packaging within the given time frame.

We ship throughout the week, except Sundays and public holidays. To ensure that your order reaches you in good condition, in the shortest span of time, we ship through reputed courier agencies only.

All tracking information will be available under the My orders section on the My account page.


How long does it take for an order to arrive?

Orders are dispatched within 3-7 working days. Most orders are delivered within 5 to 10 working days. Delivery of all orders will be duly done to the address mentioned by you at the time of placing the order.

If you wish the order to be delivered earlier, Email us at pricklybypb@gmail.com, or DM us on Instagram @pricklybypb with your desired delivery date. Additional charges may be required for express delivery.


RETURN & EXCHANGE POLICY

We have a 15-day return policy, which means you have 15 days after receiving your item to request a return. To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You must record an unboxing/unpacking video to ensure the products arrived in a defective condition. To start a return, you can contact us at pricklybypb@gmail.com, or DM us on Instagram @pricklybypb. You can also request in the My Orders section of the My Account section. Items sent back to us without first requesting a return will not be accepted.

You can always contact us for any returns-related query at pricklybypb@gmail.com, or DM us on Instagram @pricklybypb


Damages and issues

Please inspect your order upon reception and contact us immediately if the item is defective, or damaged or if you receive the wrong item so that we can evaluate the issue and make it right. You must record an unboxing/unpacking video to ensure your product is defective, or damaged or that you received the wrong item.


Exceptions / non-returnable items

Certain types of items cannot be returned like custom products (such as special orders or personalized items). Please get in touch if you have questions or concerns about your specific item. Unfortunately, we cannot accept returns on sale items or gift cards.


Refunds

We will notify you once we’ve received and inspected your return, and let you know if the refund was approved or not. If approved, you’ll be automatically refunded on your original payment method. Please remember it can take some time for your bank or credit card company to process and post the refund too


{/*
*/}
); } export default Return;
